name: Suspicious Silhouette: A Roleplaying Mistery
description:
"Suspicious Silhouette: A Roleplaying mistery" is a short visual novel with 8 different endings where a Dungeon Master must find out the circumstances and responsibilities of an incident in which a character sheet becomes useless. She must  interrogate the players and analyze the room and their own memories.

It's my first try at Renpy. Looking for collaborators for future projects.
